name: Waxman Energy Ltd
description:
Waxman Energy/Renewables, one of the UK's leading specialists in the design and distribution of renewable products will once again be introducing some of our latest products at Ecobuild 2013 (stand N3341).
Waxman Renewables specialises in the design, consultation and supply of biomass boilers, air and ground source heat pumps and solar thermal systems.  It offers pellet stoves and boilers from Viessmann and Red 365, the biomass arm of Italian stove giants MCZ, solar thermal systems from Austrian firm TiSun, Turkish manufacturer Ezinc and Swiss company AMK.  Waxman also offers an excellent range of heat pumps from both Dimplex and Panasonic.
Waxman Energy will be showcasing its design and technical expertise as well as its extensive product portfolio which includes PV panels, mounting systems and inverters from some of the world's leading solar manufacturers.
